Class Particle

java.lang.Object
  Particle
Direct Known Subclasses:
Particle3D
public class Particle
extends java.lang.Object

The Particle class defines a particle, with a mass, a location, a speed, a net force, and a color.

Author:
Christopher Glasz

Field Summary
protected  java.awt.Color color
          The color of the particle
protected static double mass
          The mass of the particle
protected static int radius
          The radius of the particle
protected  double x
          The location of the particle
protected  double xNetForce
          The x component of the current net force acting on the particle
protected  double xSpeed
          The current speed of the particle
protected  double y
          The location of the particle
protected  double yNetForce
          The y component of the current net force acting on the particle
protected  double ySpeed
          The current speed of the particle
 
Constructor Summary
Particle(double x, double y)
          The constructor creates a particle at the given location with a speed of zero and the standard mass

Parameters:

colorByForce

public void colorByForce()
Sets the particles color according to the net force acting on it. The larger the net force, the warmer the color. particles with low net force are a subdued blue.
